article_title: How many businesses cut part-time hours because of the Affordable Care Act?
article_text: Heather Stauffer covers the health care industry. She can be reached at hstauffer@lnpnews.com or 717-481-6022.

article_metadata.author: HEATHER STAUFFER | Staff Writer

og.description: About 20 percent, according to a new national survey. In Lancaster County, it's harder to say -- but benefits advisers here say some companies are doing it.
